public ref class EnumerableRowCollectionExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含資料列集合類別的擴充方法。

span.span: Contains the extension methods for the data row collection classes.

summary.span: 這個 API 支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不適合直接從您的程式碼中使用。

span.span: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含可定義靜態延伸方法方法和標準查詢作業和類別。The class contains static extension methods that define the method and standard query operations for the and classes. 這個類別無法被繼承，而且無法具現化。This class cannot be inherited and cannot be instantiated.

span.span: Converts the elements of an to the specified type.

summary.span: 這個 API 支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不適合直接從您的程式碼中使用。

returns.span: ，包含已轉換成指定之型別的每個來源序列項目。

span.span: An that contains each element of the source sequence converted to the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 無法將序列中的項目轉換為型別 。

span.span: An element in the sequence cannot be cast to type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 此投影方法需要轉換函式`selector`，產生一個在來源序列，每個值的值`source`。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`本身就是集合的值傳回，負責決定是否要以手動方式周遊子取用者。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually.

summary.span: 依遞增順序，執行 中資料列的次要排序作業。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用作業需要現有主要排序作業使用。The use of a operation requires an existing primary sorting operation using . 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic.
